data.text: @SenatorLankford Probably a J6 traitor that Trump pardoned

@SenatorLankford Y’all need to read the Epstein files. Shows Trump, Bannon, Epstein committed treason against the USA. Also, child rape and trafficking. Punishment for treason? Death, imprisonment, disqualification from holding office. The PEOPLE demand justice for Americans and for victims.
@SenatorLankford Hey, Jimmy.  As a long time #PedophileProtector, do you still believe 13yo girls can consent?   Local news: https://t.co/SVZsVwr1NA

@SenatorLankford The Islamic Republic spent decades funding and arming America’s enemies.
Nearly 2,000 U.S. troops were killed as a result.
The richest terrorist network in history—built on Iran’s oil and gold.
That’s a betrayal of American blood.
And a betrayal of the Iranian people as well. https://t.co/AIl4IdApeg

@SenatorLankford GOP. WAKE.UP. THIS. MESS. IS. ON. YOU. Twice you failed us. The people are in the streets. The Dems impeached Trump 2 times. The UK Parliament investigates Epstein and Trump. UK fires ambassador over kompromat. Fire Trump. Fire Palantir. Fire Musk. We did not vote for this.
